title.bibl: Denni Hlasatel, Dec. 23, 1917. Cicero and Clyde

div.bibl: Denni Hlasatel, Dec. 23, 1917. CICERO AND CLYDE

body.p: The Club of Czechoslovak Taxpayers in Cicero is exerting its political influence to bring about a merger of the Cicero and Clyde school systems. Clyde is in fact only a district of Cicero, and is governed by the same administration. Nevertheless, its schools belong to another district. A petition in favor of a merger is being circulated among the registered voters of Clyde, who have the decisive word in the matter.
